mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_pic AS "goodsPic", a.goods_spe AS "goodsSpe", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.goods_num AS "goodsNum", a.goods_total AS "goodsTotal", a.oppen_id AS "oppenId", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zl_cart a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.goods_name LIKE '%'||#{goodsName}||'%' '%'+#{goodsName}+'%' concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
AND a.oppen_id LIKE '%'||#{oppenId}||'%' '%'+#{oppenId}+'%' concat('%',#{oppenId},'%')
AND a.goods_id in (${goodsId})
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zl_cart( goods_id, goods_name, goods_pic, goods_spe, goods_price, goods_num, goods_total, oppen_id, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_time, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPic}, #{goodsSpe}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsNum}, #{goodsTotal}, #{oppenId}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zl_cart SET goods_id = #{goodsId}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_pic = #{goodsPic}, goods_spe = #{goodsSpe}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_num = #{goodsNum}, goods_total = #{goodsTotal}, oppen_id = #{oppenId}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(goods_num),0) from zl_cart where oppen_id=#{oppenId} and del_flag='0'
